text: David and Victoria Beckham enjoy romantic walk in the countryside They have been married since 1999 David and Victoria Beckham made the most of the sunny weather over the weekend and enjoyed spending some quality time together as a family. The couple had fun going on a country walk with their dog Olive, and their six - year - old daughter Harper, following the recent speculation that they are separating. Taking to Instagram Stories, Victoria shared footage of their day out, showing David turning around to look lovingly at her as they made their way through the field. ` ` Happy Saturday'', she captioned the post. At the beginning of the month, David and Victoria Beckham were forced to deny that they were splitting up after social media was rife with rumours that the pair were preparing to announce their divorce.
